response.name: Happy Birthday Special
response.description: A highly engaging interactive birthday greeting video template that allows personalization of text and images, making the recipient feel special.

variables.name: recipient_name
variables.description: The recipient's name, which will be displayed in the video.

variables.name: birthday_message
variables.description: A custom birthday message that can be personalized for the recipient.

variables.name: background_image
variables.description: An optional background image that can be personalized based on the recipient's preferences.

variables.name: music_track
variables.description: A selectable music track to play in the background of the video.

response.instructions: Customize the template using the available variables. Ensure all text fields are filled with proper content and that any images used are of high quality. Choose a music track that matches the tone of the video. Preview your creation before sending it to ensure a personalized experience for your recipient.

response.name: Corporate Welcome
response.description: A personalized image template designed to welcome new employees to the corporation. The template includes placeholders for the employee's name, position, and other customizable elements to make them feel part of the team.

variables.name: employee_name
variables.description: The new employee's name, displayed prominently on the welcome image.

variables.name: position_title
variables.description: The position or title of the new employee within the company.

variables.name: start_date
variables.description: The date on which the new employee will start.

variables.name: company_logo
variables.description: The company's logo, which can be inserted into the template.

variables.name: team_photo
variables.description: A photo of the employee's future team or department.

response.instructions: To create a warm welcome for the new team member, personalize this image with their name, title, and a welcoming message. Add the company logo and a photograph of their team to foster a sense of belonging from day one. Before finalizing the image, make sure all the information is accurate and that the visuals are aligned with the company's branding.

response.name: New Year Extravaganza
response.description: A vibrant and festive New Year greeting image template that captures the spirit of celebration. Personalize it with the recipient's name and your heartfelt wishes for the new year.

variables.name: recipient_name
variables.description: The name of the recipient to be displayed prominently on the greeting image.

variables.name: new_year_message
variables.description: A personalized message conveying new year wishes to the recipient.

variables.name: firework_style
variables.description: Choose a firework display style from our gallery to add a festive flair to the image.

response.instructions: Select the New Year Extravaganza template and fill in the variables with appropriate text to make your greeting personal. Customize the firework style by selecting an image from the gallery. Ensure the text is clear and legible, and preview your customized image before sharing it with your recipient to celebrate the new year with a touch of personalization.

response.name: New Year Celebrations
response.description: A festive New Year greeting image template that can be customized with personal messages, colors, and images to convey warm wishes.

variables.name: recipient_name
variables.description: The name of the recipient that will be displayed on the greeting image.

variables.name: new_year_message
variables.description: A heartfelt personal message to celebrate the New Year.

variables.name: custom_image
variables.description: An image that the sender can upload to make the greeting card more personal.

variables.name: theme_color
variables.description: A selectable color that sets the overall theme of the greeting card, consistent with New Year celebrations.

response.instructions: To create a personalized New Year greeting card, begin by entering the recipient's name and a unique New Year message. Optionally, you can upload a custom image to include in the card and select a theme color that reflects the festive mood. Preview the image to make sure all elements look harmonious and the text is readable. Finalize your personalized creation and share it to spread the joy of the New Year.

response.name: Ultimate Product Showcase
response.description: A dynamic product showcase image template that allows customization of product images, descriptions, and pricing information to create a unique presentation for each viewer.

variables.name: product_name
variables.description: The name of the product to be highlighted in the image.

variables.name: product_image
variables.description: The main image of the product to be displayed within the template.

variables.name: product_price
variables.description: The price of the product which can be dynamically inserted into the image.

variables.name: product_description
variables.description: A brief description or features of the product to be included in the image.

variables.name: discount_tag
variables.description: Optional tag to display any ongoing discounts or offers associated with the product.

response.instructions: Select the product you wish to showcase and gather all the necessary information including the product's name, image, price, and detailed description. Customize the template by inserting the collected information into their corresponding variables. Add any discount information if applicable. Review the design to ensure all details are well-positioned and readable. Save your final product image and use it in your marketing campaigns to attract and engage your target audience.

response.name: Annual Sales Event Promo
response.description: An interactive video template designed to boost customer engagement during the annual sales event. It features dynamic text overlays and clickable call-to-action buttons.

variables.name: customer_name
variables.description: The customer's name to be displayed within the video for a personalized touch.

variables.name: discount_offer
variables.description: The special discount offer to be highlighted in the video to attract the customer's attention.

variables.name: event_dates
variables.description: The starting and ending dates of the sales event.

variables.name: cta_button
variables.description: A customizable call-to-action button that leads to the promotion's landing page or a specific product page.

response.instructions: Edit the template by inserting the required variables such as customer name, discount offer, and event dates. Customize the call-to-action button to direct customers to the desired URL. Review all personalizations and test the interactive elements before deploying the campaign to ensure optimal user interaction and effectiveness.
